section.name: Creating a Parser
section.p: The newParser method on CommandLineParserFactory is used to create command line parser instances.
section.source: // create a command line parser CommandLineParser parser = CommandLineParserFactory.newParser();

section.name: The right tool for the job
section.p: Different applications may require different parsing implementation strategies. CLI ships with two implementations: PosixParser and GnuParser. Both of these implement the CommandLineParser interface.

section.name: Parse the command line
section.p: Now that a parser has been created the command line tokens can be parsed. The two parse methods on CommandLineParser perform this task.
